about.a_where: We're working remotely, so we're everywhere?
about.a_who: We are a corp, made with a couple of scientist, a couple of genies engineers, and one part time designer.

detail_value.applicable_jamming: * 任何无线电通讯式机型

learn_more.a_scenarios: Applicable to the radio monitoring, low-altitude airspace safety prevention & control in locations of government and military organs, industry base, power plant, airport, border customs and coastal defense, etc. Or simply, applicable to any no-drone zone.
learn_more.a_what: CUAS is type of device which dedicated to defense unmaned-vehicle invasion, or a more radical approach: they attack.
learn_more.a_what_zeewind_provide: We are providing integrated detection and countermeasures equipment, aka "AiO CUAS Device" RCE-1U; Zeewind's philosophy is different from the common products on the market that focus on defense. We prefer to take the initiative.
learn_more.interesting: We also have a cyberattack device under development, witch can hacking those type of drone and gain control permission. Check our [article](link) for more details.
learn_more.q_scenarios: What are the application scenarios for this type of product?
learn_more.q_what_zeewind_provide: What services or products does ZEEWIND provide?

mention.rce1u: We have fully test on DJI [Avatar, FPV, Mavic, Mavic Air, Mavic Mini, Mavic Phantom, Mavic Spark] and Parrot [ANAFI, Bebop, Bebop 2 Power]. Theoretically, this type of radio jamming device can effect to most of the devices including but not limited to [UAV, ground drones, mobile phones, remote controller (ground station), etc...].

products.rce1u_describe: RCE-1U 是一款侦测反制一体式无人机反制设备，设备通过发射特定频段电磁波对无人机进行干扰反制，从而阻断无人机的通信或导航链路，快速实现目标的驱离或迫降。该产品，实时显示反制模式、电量等信息，可单独使用，也可与无人机探测产品组成 “察打一体” 系统。

string.company_introduce: 是一家专注于无人飞行器检测和对抗设备（无人机反制设备）的研发和生产的公司。我们致力于提供专业的空域安全解决方案。除此之外，ZEEWIND 还提供行业垂直领域咨询服务，帮助客户了解并满足其专业需求。
string.company_name_full: 深圳市智影达科技有限公司
string.company_slogan: 先进空域安全解决方案
string.contact_us_mention: 由于邮件保护，若三个工作日内未收到回复，请您直接与我们联系。
string.ur_msg_placeholder: 告诉我们您想了解的任何内容
